      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>Next time you go shopping, think about this: What if brands asked for your opinion on their products before they put them on the shelf? Wouldnâ€™t that be nice? At Netquest we give voice to the consumers enabling them to shape the products and services of tomorrow. How? We deliver consumersâ€™ genuine opinions and data to help companies create better products for you.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>At Netquest, having a loyal base of collaborators (more than two million panelists) for market research is essential for our business. Therefore, we need to engage them whilst keep recruiting new ones in order to expand our panel.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Weâ€™re now looking for a â€‹Backend Engineer (JAVA) to join our development team and help us outline our platformsâ€™ architecture, participating in the definition of the technology stack, and the design of the involved services.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Several years ago we built our own platform and due to the evolution of the business and the technology, weÂ´re rebuilding it from scratch adapting it to our current and future needs, and the volume of data we're currently dealing with, and also prepare it to handle the business growth we're experiencing.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We are now focused on developing solutions to support our business need to engage &amp; recruit panelists. Some of them are: an online shop, a scalable recruitment system, catalog, logistics&nbsp;and communications systems, integrations with dropshipping APIs...&nbsp;</p>
        <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
        <p>Your profile:&nbsp;</p>
        <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
        <p>â—? You are experienced in development with JAVA (7-11)</p>
        <p>â—? You have software development patterns knowledge and deep technical and software design background</p>
        <p>â—? You have experience working with Git and some variant of Gitflow</p>
        <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in high performance distributed systems</p>
        <p>â—? You have some testing automation knowledge and experience on web standards</p>
        <p>â—? You are committed with development and quality, with a perfection-driven attitude</p>
        <p>â—? You are curious and proactive about development methodologies and techniques&nbsp;</p>
        <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
        <p>Itâ€™s a plus if:&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>â—? You have work experience on RDBMS and NoSQL systems</p>
        <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in the functional programming paradigm</p>
        <p>â—? You are familiar with the usage of persistence systems such as Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB or Redis, for instance&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We offer you:&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>â—? To be part of a team always interested in the newest technology, depending on your skills and assignment, the stack youÂ´ll work with may include: JAVA, Spring Boot, Python, MySQL, NoSQL, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.</p>
        <p>â—? A challenging project, where you can learn new things every day and show the team what youâ€™ve got</p>
        <p>â—? The possibility to be part of a talented team, working with highly skilled individuals, always open to share their knowledge</p>
        <p>â—? A nice place to work, where we foster training, as well as professional and personal development â—? Flexible working hours with remote work options&nbsp;</p>
        <p>â—? Flexible retribution: meal and transport tickets, kindergarden cheques and/or private health insurance</p>
        <p>â—? And free coffee and fresh fruit once a week.&nbsp;</p>
        <p>At Netquest, weâ€™re a team in constant growth. Currently, weâ€™re more than 250 people coming from&nbsp;&nbsp;27 nationalities. Weâ€™re committed to equal employment opportunity and we strive to be a more equal opportunity workplace day by day.&nbsp;</p>

       <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQEDemddTJA-eQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=6qDze0BljyKE1VnHScUNrY839FTUxM7GW_As6ja0knY" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Gabija Norkaityte">

     <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>Next time you go shopping, think about this: What if brands asked for your opinion on their products before they put them on the shelf? Wouldnâ€™t that be nice? At Netquest we give voice to the consumers enabling them to shape the products and services of tomorrow. How? We deliver consumersâ€™ genuine opinions and data to help companies create better products for you.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>At Netquest, having a loyal base of collaborators (more than two million panelists) for market research is essential for our business. Therefore, we need to engage them whilst keep recruiting new ones in order to expand our panel.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Weâ€™re now looking for a â€‹Backend Engineer (JAVA) to join our development team and help us outline our platformsâ€™ architecture, participating in the definition of the technology stack, and the design of the involved services.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Several years ago we built our own platform and due to the evolution of the business and the technology, weÂ´re rebuilding it from scratch adapting it to our current and future needs, and the volume of data we're currently dealing with, and also prepare it to handle the business growth we're experiencing.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We are now focused on developing solutions to support our business need to engage &amp; recruit panelists. Some of them are: an online shop, a scalable recruitment system, catalog, logistics&nbsp;and communications systems, integrations with dropshipping APIs...&nbsp;</p>
        <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
        <p>Your profile:&nbsp;</p>
        <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
        <p>â—? You are experienced in development with JAVA (7-11)</p>
        <p>â—? You have software development patterns knowledge and deep technical and software design background</p>
        <p>â—? You have experience working with Git and some variant of Gitflow</p>
        <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in high performance distributed systems</p>
        <p>â—? You have some testing automation knowledge and experience on web standards</p>
        <p>â—? You are committed with development and quality, with a perfection-driven attitude</p>
        <p>â—? You are curious and proactive about development methodologies and techniques&nbsp;</p>
        <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
        <p>Itâ€™s a plus if:&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>â—? You have work experience on RDBMS and NoSQL systems</p>
        <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in the functional programming paradigm</p>
        <p>â—? You are familiar with the usage of persistence systems such as Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB or Redis, for instance&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We offer you:&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>â—? To be part of a team always interested in the newest technology, depending on your skills and assignment, the stack youÂ´ll work with may include: JAVA, Spring Boot, Python, MySQL, NoSQL, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.</p>
        <p>â—? A challenging project, where you can learn new things every day and show the team what youâ€™ve got</p>
        <p>â—? The possibility to be part of a talented team, working with highly skilled individuals, always open to share their knowledge</p>
        <p>â—? A nice place to work, where we foster training, as well as professional and personal development â—? Flexible working hours with remote work options&nbsp;</p>
        <p>â—? Flexible retribution: meal and transport tickets, kindergarden cheques and/or private health insurance</p>
        <p>â—? And free coffee and fresh fruit once a week.&nbsp;</p>
        <p>At Netquest, weâ€™re a team in constant growth. Currently, weâ€™re more than 250 people coming from&nbsp;&nbsp;27 nationalities. Weâ€™re committed to equal employment opportunity and we strive to be a more equal opportunity workplace day by day.&nbsp;</p>

   <section class="description">
    <div class="message-the-recruiter">
     <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Netquest</p>
     <div class="base-main-card">
      <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQEDemddTJA-eQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=6qDze0BljyKE1VnHScUNrY839FTUxM7GW_As6ja0knY" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Gabija Norkaityte">
      <div class="base-main-card__info">
       <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Gabija Norkaityte</h3>
       <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Internal Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist at GfK - WE ARE HIRING!</h4>
      </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Gabija Norkaityte" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fuk%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fgabija-norkaityte&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
       <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
     <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
      <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
       <p>Next time you go shopping, think about this: What if brands asked for your opinion on their products before they put them on the shelf? Wouldnâ€™t that be nice? At Netquest we give voice to the consumers enabling them to shape the products and services of tomorrow. How? We deliver consumersâ€™ genuine opinions and data to help companies create better products for you.&nbsp;</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>At Netquest, having a loyal base of collaborators (more than two million panelists) for market research is essential for our business. Therefore, we need to engage them whilst keep recruiting new ones in order to expand our panel.&nbsp;</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>Weâ€™re now looking for a â€‹Backend Engineer (JAVA) to join our development team and help us outline our platformsâ€™ architecture, participating in the definition of the technology stack, and the design of the involved services.&nbsp;</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>Several years ago we built our own platform and due to the evolution of the business and the technology, weÂ´re rebuilding it from scratch adapting it to our current and future needs, and the volume of data we're currently dealing with, and also prepare it to handle the business growth we're experiencing.&nbsp;</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>We are now focused on developing solutions to support our business need to engage &amp; recruit panelists. Some of them are: an online shop, a scalable recruitment system, catalog, logistics&nbsp;and communications systems, integrations with dropshipping APIs...&nbsp;</p>
       <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
       <p>Your profile:&nbsp;</p>
       <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
       <p>â—? You are experienced in development with JAVA (7-11)</p>
       <p>â—? You have software development patterns knowledge and deep technical and software design background</p>
       <p>â—? You have experience working with Git and some variant of Gitflow</p>
       <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in high performance distributed systems</p>
       <p>â—? You have some testing automation knowledge and experience on web standards</p>

     <icon class="show-more-less__button--chevron similar-searches__button--chevron" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/e8cc7fz0dy4ktz52h70zdk0pp" /></button><button class="show-more-less__less-button similar-searches__less-button show-more-less__button similar-searches__button show-more-less__button--hide similar-searches__button--hide" aria-expanded="false" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show_less">Mostrar menos

  <section class="description">
   <div class="message-the-recruiter">
    <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Netquest</p>
    <div class="base-main-card">
     <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQEDemddTJA-eQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=6qDze0BljyKE1VnHScUNrY839FTUxM7GW_As6ja0knY" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Gabija Norkaityte">
     <div class="base-main-card__info">
      <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Gabija Norkaityte</h3>
      <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Internal Technical Talent Acquisition Specialist at GfK - WE ARE HIRING!</h4>
     </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Gabija Norkaityte" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fuk%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fgabija-norkaityte&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
      <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
    <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
     <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
      <p>Next time you go shopping, think about this: What if brands asked for your opinion on their products before they put them on the shelf? Wouldnâ€™t that be nice? At Netquest we give voice to the consumers enabling them to shape the products and services of tomorrow. How? We deliver consumersâ€™ genuine opinions and data to help companies create better products for you.&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>At Netquest, having a loyal base of collaborators (more than two million panelists) for market research is essential for our business. Therefore, we need to engage them whilst keep recruiting new ones in order to expand our panel.&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>Weâ€™re now looking for a â€‹Backend Engineer (JAVA) to join our development team and help us outline our platformsâ€™ architecture, participating in the definition of the technology stack, and the design of the involved services.&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>Several years ago we built our own platform and due to the evolution of the business and the technology, weÂ´re rebuilding it from scratch adapting it to our current and future needs, and the volume of data we're currently dealing with, and also prepare it to handle the business growth we're experiencing.&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>We are now focused on developing solutions to support our business need to engage &amp; recruit panelists. Some of them are: an online shop, a scalable recruitment system, catalog, logistics&nbsp;and communications systems, integrations with dropshipping APIs...&nbsp;</p>
      <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
      <p>Your profile:&nbsp;</p>
      <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
      <p>â—? You are experienced in development with JAVA (7-11)</p>
      <p>â—? You have software development patterns knowledge and deep technical and software design background</p>
      <p>â—? You have experience working with Git and some variant of Gitflow</p>
      <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in high performance distributed systems</p>
      <p>â—? You have some testing automation knowledge and experience on web standards</p>
      <p>â—? You are committed with development and quality, with a perfection-driven attitude</p>
      <p>â—? You are curious and proactive about development methodologies and techniques&nbsp;</p>
      <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
      <p>Itâ€™s a plus if:&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>â—? You have work experience on RDBMS and NoSQL systems</p>
      <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in the functional programming paradigm</p>
      <p>â—? You are familiar with the usage of persistence systems such as Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB or Redis, for instance&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>We offer you:&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>â—? To be part of a team always interested in the newest technology, depending on your skills and assignment, the stack youÂ´ll work with may include: JAVA, Spring Boot, Python, MySQL, NoSQL, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.</p>
      <p>â—? A challenging project, where you can learn new things every day and show the team what youâ€™ve got</p>

      <p>â—? A nice place to work, where we foster training, as well as professional and personal development â—? Flexible working hours with remote work options&nbsp;</p>
      <p>â—? Flexible retribution: meal and transport tickets, kindergarden cheques and/or private health insurance</p>
      <p>â—? And free coffee and fresh fruit once a week.&nbsp;</p>
      <p>At Netquest, weâ€™re a team in constant growth. Currently, weâ€™re more than 250 people coming from&nbsp;&nbsp;27 nationalities. Weâ€™re committed to equal employment opportunity and we strive to be a more equal opportunity workplace day by day.&nbsp;</p>

  <div class="message-the-recruiter">
   <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Netquest</p>
   <div class="base-main-card">
    <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQEDemddTJA-eQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=6qDze0BljyKE1VnHScUNrY839FTUxM7GW_As6ja0knY" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Gabija Norkaityte">

     <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Gabija Norkaityte</h3>

    </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Gabija Norkaityte" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fuk%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fgabija-norkaityte&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>

  <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
   <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
    <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
     <p>Next time you go shopping, think about this: What if brands asked for your opinion on their products before they put them on the shelf? Wouldnâ€™t that be nice? At Netquest we give voice to the consumers enabling them to shape the products and services of tomorrow. How? We deliver consumersâ€™ genuine opinions and data to help companies create better products for you.&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>At Netquest, having a loyal base of collaborators (more than two million panelists) for market research is essential for our business. Therefore, we need to engage them whilst keep recruiting new ones in order to expand our panel.&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>Weâ€™re now looking for a â€‹Backend Engineer (JAVA) to join our development team and help us outline our platformsâ€™ architecture, participating in the definition of the technology stack, and the design of the involved services.&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>Several years ago we built our own platform and due to the evolution of the business and the technology, weÂ´re rebuilding it from scratch adapting it to our current and future needs, and the volume of data we're currently dealing with, and also prepare it to handle the business growth we're experiencing.&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>We are now focused on developing solutions to support our business need to engage &amp; recruit panelists. Some of them are: an online shop, a scalable recruitment system, catalog, logistics&nbsp;and communications systems, integrations with dropshipping APIs...&nbsp;</p>
     <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
     <p>Your profile:&nbsp;</p>
     <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
     <p>â—? You are experienced in development with JAVA (7-11)</p>
     <p>â—? You have software development patterns knowledge and deep technical and software design background</p>
     <p>â—? You have experience working with Git and some variant of Gitflow</p>
     <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in high performance distributed systems</p>
     <p>â—? You have some testing automation knowledge and experience on web standards</p>
     <p>â—? You are committed with development and quality, with a perfection-driven attitude</p>
     <p>â—? You are curious and proactive about development methodologies and techniques&nbsp;</p>
     <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
     <p>Itâ€™s a plus if:&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>â—? You have work experience on RDBMS and NoSQL systems</p>
     <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in the functional programming paradigm</p>
     <p>â—? You are familiar with the usage of persistence systems such as Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB or Redis, for instance&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>We offer you:&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>â—? To be part of a team always interested in the newest technology, depending on your skills and assignment, the stack youÂ´ll work with may include: JAVA, Spring Boot, Python, MySQL, NoSQL, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.</p>
     <p>â—? A challenging project, where you can learn new things every day and show the team what youâ€™ve got</p>
     <p>â—? The possibility to be part of a talented team, working with highly skilled individuals, always open to share their knowledge</p>
     <p>â—? A nice place to work, where we foster training, as well as professional and personal development â—? Flexible working hours with remote work options&nbsp;</p>
     <p>â—? Flexible retribution: meal and transport tickets, kindergarden cheques and/or private health insurance</p>
     <p>â—? And free coffee and fresh fruit once a week.&nbsp;</p>
     <p>At Netquest, weâ€™re a team in constant growth. Currently, weâ€™re more than 250 people coming from&nbsp;&nbsp;27 nationalities. Weâ€™re committed to equal employment opportunity and we strive to be a more equal opportunity workplace day by day.&nbsp;</p>

 <div class="topcard__content-left">
  <h1 class="topcard__title">Backend (Java) Engineer</h1>
  <h3 class="topcard__flavor-row"><span class="topcard__flavor"><a class="topcard__org-name-link topcard__flavor--black-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="https://es.linkedin.com/company/netquest?trk=public_jobs_topcard_org_name" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_topcard_org_name" data-tracking-will-navigate>Netquest</a></span><span class="topcard__flavor topcard__flavor--bullet">Barcelona</span></h3>
  <h3 class="topcard__flavor-row"><span class="topcard__flavor--metadata posted-time-ago__text">Hace 3 dÃ­as</span>

    <p>Next time you go shopping, think about this: What if brands asked for your opinion on their products before they put them on the shelf? Wouldnâ€™t that be nice? At Netquest we give voice to the consumers enabling them to shape the products and services of tomorrow. How? We deliver consumersâ€™ genuine opinions and data to help companies create better products for you.&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>At Netquest, having a loyal base of collaborators (more than two million panelists) for market research is essential for our business. Therefore, we need to engage them whilst keep recruiting new ones in order to expand our panel.&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>Weâ€™re now looking for a â€‹Backend Engineer (JAVA) to join our development team and help us outline our platformsâ€™ architecture, participating in the definition of the technology stack, and the design of the involved services.&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>Several years ago we built our own platform and due to the evolution of the business and the technology, weÂ´re rebuilding it from scratch adapting it to our current and future needs, and the volume of data we're currently dealing with, and also prepare it to handle the business growth we're experiencing.&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>We are now focused on developing solutions to support our business need to engage &amp; recruit panelists. Some of them are: an online shop, a scalable recruitment system, catalog, logistics&nbsp;and communications systems, integrations with dropshipping APIs...&nbsp;</p>
    <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
    <p>Your profile:&nbsp;</p>
    <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
    <p>â—? You are experienced in development with JAVA (7-11)</p>
    <p>â—? You have software development patterns knowledge and deep technical and software design background</p>
    <p>â—? You have experience working with Git and some variant of Gitflow</p>
    <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in high performance distributed systems</p>
    <p>â—? You have some testing automation knowledge and experience on web standards</p>
    <p>â—? You are committed with development and quality, with a perfection-driven attitude</p>
    <p>â—? You are curious and proactive about development methodologies and techniques&nbsp;</p>
    <p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
    <p>Itâ€™s a plus if:&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>â—? You have work experience on RDBMS and NoSQL systems</p>
    <p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in the functional programming paradigm</p>
    <p>â—? You are familiar with the usage of persistence systems such as Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB or Redis, for instance&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>We offer you:&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>â—? To be part of a team always interested in the newest technology, depending on your skills and assignment, the stack youÂ´ll work with may include: JAVA, Spring Boot, Python, MySQL, NoSQL, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.</p>
    <p>â—? A challenging project, where you can learn new things every day and show the team what youâ€™ve got</p>
    <p>â—? The possibility to be part of a talented team, working with highly skilled individuals, always open to share their knowledge</p>
    <p>â—? A nice place to work, where we foster training, as well as professional and personal development â—? Flexible working hours with remote work options&nbsp;</p>
    <p>â—? Flexible retribution: meal and transport tickets, kindergarden cheques and/or private health insurance</p>
    <p>â—? And free coffee and fresh fruit once a week.&nbsp;</p>
    <p>At Netquest, weâ€™re a team in constant growth. Currently, weâ€™re more than 250 people coming from&nbsp;&nbsp;27 nationalities. Weâ€™re committed to equal employment opportunity and we strive to be a more equal opportunity workplace day by day.&nbsp;</p>

<p>Next time you go shopping, think about this: What if brands asked for your opinion on their products before they put them on the shelf? Wouldnâ€™t that be nice? At Netquest we give voice to the consumers enabling them to shape the products and services of tomorrow. How? We deliver consumersâ€™ genuine opinions and data to help companies create better products for you.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>At Netquest, having a loyal base of collaborators (more than two million panelists) for market research is essential for our business. Therefore, we need to engage them whilst keep recruiting new ones in order to expand our panel.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>Weâ€™re now looking for a â€‹Backend Engineer (JAVA) to join our development team and help us outline our platformsâ€™ architecture, participating in the definition of the technology stack, and the design of the involved services.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>Several years ago we built our own platform and due to the evolution of the business and the technology, weÂ´re rebuilding it from scratch adapting it to our current and future needs, and the volume of data we're currently dealing with, and also prepare it to handle the business growth we're experiencing.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>We are now focused on developing solutions to support our business need to engage &amp; recruit panelists. Some of them are: an online shop, a scalable recruitment system, catalog, logistics&nbsp;and communications systems, integrations with dropshipping APIs...&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>Your profile:&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>â—? You are experienced in development with JAVA (7-11)</p>
<p>â—? You have software development patterns knowledge and deep technical and software design background</p>
<p>â—? You have experience working with Git and some variant of Gitflow</p>
<p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in high performance distributed systems</p>
<p>â—? You have some testing automation knowledge and experience on web standards</p>
<p>â—? You are committed with development and quality, with a perfection-driven attitude</p>
<p>â—? You are curious and proactive about development methodologies and techniques&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>Itâ€™s a plus if:&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>â—? You have work experience on RDBMS and NoSQL systems</p>
<p>â—? You are interested and/or experienced in the functional programming paradigm</p>
<p>â—? You are familiar with the usage of persistence systems such as Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB or Redis, for instance&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>We offer you:&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>â—? To be part of a team always interested in the newest technology, depending on your skills and assignment, the stack youÂ´ll work with may include: JAVA, Spring Boot, Python, MySQL, NoSQL, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.</p>
<p>â—? A challenging project, where you can learn new things every day and show the team what youâ€™ve got</p>
<p>â—? The possibility to be part of a talented team, working with highly skilled individuals, always open to share their knowledge</p>
<p>â—? A nice place to work, where we foster training, as well as professional and personal development â—? Flexible working hours with remote work options&nbsp;</p>
<p>â—? Flexible retribution: meal and transport tickets, kindergarden cheques and/or private health insurance</p>
<p>â—? And free coffee and fresh fruit once a week.&nbsp;</p>
<p>At Netquest, weâ€™re a team in constant growth. Currently, weâ€™re more than 250 people coming from&nbsp;&nbsp;27 nationalities. Weâ€™re committed to equal employment opportunity and we strive to be a more equal opportunity workplace day by day.&nbsp;</p>
